name: slide_when_moving
description: If true, makes this <%= doc_class_name %> slide along the ground when moving between <%= type 'Tile' %>s.
Otherwise, they will warp to the <%= type 'Tile' %>.

parameters.name: has_effect
parameters.desc: `true` if you want this <%= doc_class_name %> to have the `FloatShoe` effect. Otherwise `false`.
